message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, considering it's worth $12,000 to you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to get at least $13,000 for this product.  I'm confident it will be worth that to you.  Let's see if we can find a compromise that works for both of us.
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
